title: Nigeria’s NNPC Plans to Develop New Oil Fields to Boost Output
description: Nigeria’s state-owned oil producer plans to develop new oil fields from next year and seeks to raise at least $30 billion by the end of the decade, senior officials familiar with the plans said.
content: Nigeria’s state-owned oil producer plans to develop new oil fields from next year and seeks to raise at least $30 billion by the end of the decade, senior officials familiar with the plans said.
